name: 蔡銘修
objective:
探討網路專題與問題導向學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習專題與問題導向之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、環境、教師教學、學生學習、評量、實際案例、未來趨勢。
To explore  advanced issues on Web project-based and problem-based learning including their theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, teacher teaching,student learning, assessment, practical cases, and future treand etc...
